node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `annotation` ( `annotation_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ann_node` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `ann_text` text COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci, `ann_location` char(255) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`annotation_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci
node.title: annotation
